| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Verse.org/Verse }` |

`map.Length():int`

## Parameters

`map.Length` does not take any parameters.

## Attributes, Specifiers, and Effects

The following attributes, specifiers, and effects determine how you can interact with `map.Length` in your programs, as well as how it behaves in your programs and UEFN. For the complete list of attributes, specifiers, and effects; see the [Specifiers Page](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/specifiers-and-attributes-in-verse).
